title: Help with these handwritten fonts
content:
Hi,

I need help finding what these handwriting fonts are.

thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080526052616im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_6262.jpg)

 [‹ simple heavy black](http://web.archive.org/web/20080526052616/http:/typophile.com/node/45634 "Go to previous forum topic") [New York Times Magazine Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080526052616/http:/typophile.com/node/39558 "Go to next forum topic")
author: popinfresh

comments.content: [Pristina](http://web.archive.org/web/20080526052616/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/pristina/familytree.html) for The Fischbeins and [Andy MT](http://web.archive.org/web/20080526052616/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/andy/familytree.html) for the rest.
